name: epi_b0_correct.py
author: AFNI Developers
description: B0 distortion correction tool using an acquired frequency (phase) image.

inputs.description: Prefix of output files; can include path.
inputs.name: Output prefix

inputs.description: Phase dataset (frequency volume); should be at similar resolution and FOV as the EPI dataset; must be scaled appropriately.
inputs.name: Input frequency dataset

inputs.description: EPI dataset to which B0 distortion correction will be applied.
inputs.name: Input EPI dataset

inputs.description: Mask of brain volume.
inputs.name: Input mask dataset

inputs.description: Magnitude dataset from which to estimate brain mask; can be used for QC imaging.
inputs.name: Input magnitude dataset

inputs.description: Anatomical dataset to be used as underlay for QC images (optional).
inputs.name: Input anatomical dataset

inputs.description: JSON file containing parameters about the EPI dataset.
inputs.name: Input EPI JSON

inputs.description: Direction (axis) of phase encoding, e.g., AP, PA, RL, ...
inputs.name: EPI PE direction

inputs.description: Bandwidth per pixel (in Hz) in the EPI dataset along the phase encode direction.
inputs.name: EPI PE bandwidth per pixel

inputs.description: Effective TE spacing of the phase encoded volume, in seconds.
inputs.name: EPI PE echo spacing

inputs.description: Voxel size along the EPI dataset's phase encode axis, in mm.
inputs.name: EPI PE voxel dimension

inputs.description: Scale to apply to frequency volume to match units (def: SF=1.0).
inputs.name: Scale frequency

inputs.description: Name for output script recording commands (def: PREFIX_cmds.tcsh).
inputs.name: Output commands script

inputs.description: Name for output text file recording relevant parameters (def: PREFIX_pars.txt).
inputs.name: Output parameters file

inputs.description: Working directory name (def: automatic name).
inputs.name: Working directory name

inputs.description: Amount of blurring to apply to masked phase encode dataset (def: BS=9).
inputs.name: Blur sigma

inputs.description: Method to recenter the phase volume within the brain mask (def: MC=mode).
inputs.name: Recenter frequency method

inputs.description: Erosion and dilation parameters for automask (when using magnitude image).
inputs.name: Mask dilation parameters

inputs.description: Don't remove the temporary directory of intermediate files.
inputs.name: No clean temporary files

inputs.description: Focus the QC images on an automask region of the underlay dataset.
inputs.name: QC box focus underlay

inputs.description: Don't generate QC images.
inputs.name: No QC images

inputs.description: Display program help in terminal.
inputs.name: Help

inputs.description: Display program version number in terminal.
inputs.name: Version

inputs.description: Display date of program's last update in terminal.
inputs.name: Date

output-files.description: Warp dataset containing the warp along the phase encode axis.
output-files.name: Warp dataset

output-files.description: Script of the commands used to generate the warp and process the EPI.
output-files.name: Commands script

output-files.description: Text file of parameters input or derived from datasets.
output-files.name: Parameters text file

output-files.description: EPI dataset with estimated distortion correction applied.
output-files.name: Unwarped EPI dataset
